DynamicText.Content: This field shows the results from the OpenAI's image analysis

DynamicText.Content: User input guiding the AI on how to interpret or process the attached image.
DynamicText.Name: User Prompt_additionalInfo

Finally you need to convert the pdf to base64 and return the base64 string\",\"path\":\"/messages<>/content\",\"status\":\"SUPPORTED\",\"fieldType\":\"STRING\",\"name\":\"content\"}]}},{\"jsonType\":\"io.atlasmap.json.v2.JsonField\",\"value\":150,\"path\":\"/max_tokens\",\"status\":\"SUPPORTED\",\"fieldType\":\"INTEGER\",\"name\":\"max_tokens\"},{\"jsonType\":\"io.atlasmap.json.v2.JsonField\",\"value\":0.5,\"path\":\"/temperature\",\"status\":\"SUPPORTED\",\"fieldType\":\"DOUBLE\",\"name\":\"temperature\"}]}},\"executionTime\":0}}","showFields":true,"documentType":"JSON","inspectionType":"INSTANCE","inspectionSource":"{\"messages\":[{\"role\":\"system\",\"content\":\"You are a helpful assistant who can create a table from the data provided and embed the table to a pdf. IntegrationSystem.Description: Connect To OpenAI GPT4o model chat completions
IntegrationSystem.Name: ConnectToOpenAI

Expressions.Value: You are a helpful assistant who can analyse the image content provided in the base64 format and summarize the data that is useful to get an insight. ensure that each point in the analysis is added to a new line and each line is numbered. Also ensure you do not include any text or characters before opening curly bracket and after closing curley bracket of the JSON.
Also ensure the analysis is done based on the following user input :
